title: Dashboard Header Displays Real-Time Metrics Correctly
description: Verify that the dashboard header correctly shows real-time summary metrics excluding canceled guests and updates metrics immediately after data changes.

steps.description: Navigate to the Dashboard home view.
Verify that the dashboard header displays guest count excluding canceled guests.
Verify that budget and task metrics are displayed with correct real-time values.
Add a new guest and mark one guest as canceled.
Check that guest count updates immediately excluding the canceled guest.
Add an expense and mark a task completed.
Verify budget and task metrics update in real-time to reflect changes.

title: Guest Management: Add a New Guest Successfully
description: Validate that users can add a new guest with all required fields and that the new guest appears in the guest list and dashboard metrics.

steps.description: Navigate to the Guests tab.
Open the add new guest form and input valid guest details following validation rules.
Submit the form.
Verify the guest is added to the guest list with correct details.
Verify the dashboard guest metrics increment accordingly.

title: Guest Management: Form Validation for Adding/Editing Guests
description: Ensure form validation works properly enforcing required fields and minimum character limits with live feedback on validation errors on the guest form.

steps.description: Navigate to add or edit guest form.
Leave required fields empty and input invalid data violating min length and schema rules.
Verify live validation errors are shown next to the respective fields.
Correct the fields with valid data.
Verify that validation errors disappear and the form allows submission.

title: Guest Management: Change Guest Attendance Status
description: Check that changing a guest's attendance status via the dropdown using React Portals updates UI and persists the change in the backend.

steps.description: Navigate to the Guests tab.
Select a guest and change their attendance status using the dropdown.
Verify the UI reflects the updated status immediately.
Reload or revisit the guest list.
Confirm the updated status persists and matches backend data.

title: Guest Management: Delete a Guest
description: Validate the functionality to delete a guest from the guest list updates UI and backend, and dashboard metrics update accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to the Guests tab.
Delete a guest from the list.
Verify the guest is removed from the list immediately.
Check the dashboard guest metrics update to reflect deletion.
Reload or revisit to confirm guest removal persists in backend.

title: Budget Management: Add New Expense with Proper Validation
description: Ensure expenses can be added using the expense form with correct fields following schema validations and feedback on errors.

steps.description: Navigate to the Budget tab.
Open the add expense form and input expense data missing required fields or with invalid values.
Verify the form shows live validation errors for missing or incorrect data.
Input valid expense details and submit.
Verify the new expense appears in the expense list.

title: Budget Management: Track Partial and Full Payments
description: Verify that payments made by multiple responsible parties can be recorded per expense and that the payment progress visualization updates correctly in real-time.

steps.description: Navigate to the Budget tab.
Select an existing expense.
Record partial payment from one responsible party.
Verify that the payment progress bar updates to reflect partial payment.
Record remaining payment(s) from other responsible party(ies).
Verify payment progress bar shows full payment completion.

title: Budget Management: Edit and Delete Expenses
description: Test that expenses can be edited and deleted with immediate UI updates and backend persistence.

steps.description: Navigate to the Budget tab.
Edit an existing expense with valid data and save.
Check that the expense list reflects the updated details immediately.
Delete an expense.
Verify the expense is removed from the list and backend.

title: Task Management: Mark Tasks as Completed and Uncompleted
description: Confirm tasks can be toggled between completed and uncompleted states with instant database synchronization and UI update.

steps.description: Navigate to the Logistics tab.
Toggle a task to completed.
Verify task state changes visually and is persisted in backend.
Toggle the same task back to uncompleted.
Check the UI and backend reflect the updated uncompleted status.

title: Task Management: Delete Completed Task
description: Validate that deleting a completed task removes it from UI and backend immediately with appropriate user feedback.

steps.description: Navigate to the Logistics tab.
Delete a completed task.
Verify the task is removed from the list and not visible upon page refresh.

title: Export Function: Export Guest Data to Excel and PDF
description: Test that guest data can be exported accurately into Excel and PDF formats reflecting current filtered data and structure.

steps.description: Navigate to the Guests tab.
Trigger export to Excel.
Verify the downloaded Excel file contains current guest data accurately.
Trigger export to PDF.
Verify the downloaded PDF accurately reflects the guest list and data.

title: Export Function: Export Expense Data to Excel and PDF
description: Ensure expense data exports to Excel and PDF formats correctly representing current expense statuses and payments.

steps.description: Navigate to the Budget tab.
Trigger export to Excel.
Verify the exported Excel file contains all expense details, including payments and status.
Trigger export to PDF.
Verify the exported PDF accurately reflects expense data and visual progress.

title: UI/UX States: Loading and Empty Data Feedback
description: Verify loading indicators display during data fetching and appropriate empty state messages appear when no guests, expenses, or tasks exist.

steps.description: Simulate slow network or server delay on navigating to Guests, Budget, and Logistics tabs.
Verify loading indicators appear during data fetching.
Clear all guests, expenses, and tasks from backend temporarily.
Verify that empty data messages are shown for each tab.

title: UI/UX States: Error Handling During Data Operations
description: Confirm that the system gracefully handles errors during CRUD operations with clear error messaging and no UI crashes.

steps.description: Simulate backend failure or network error during guest addition, expense creation, and task update.
Verify the UI shows appropriate error messages using TanStack Query error boundaries.
Check that application state remains stable and user can retry operations.

title: SPA Navigation: Tab Switching between Guests, Budget, and Logistics
description: Test that navigation between tabs in the SPA is seamless without page reloads and state is preserved appropriately.

steps.description: Navigate between Guests, Budget, and Logistics tabs multiple times.
Confirm that the URL updates correctly using Next.js routing without full page reloads.
Check that form states and list data persist or reload correctly with smooth transitions.

title: Accessibility: Dropdown and Interactive Elements Usability
description: Ensure all dropdowns, especially status change dropdowns using React Portals, and other interactive UI elements are fully accessible and functional.

steps.description: Navigate to Guests tab and open status change dropdown for a guest.
Verify dropdown is reachable via keyboard and screen readers.
Interact with dropdown to change status using keyboard and mouse.
Check UI updates correctly and focus management is proper.
